content: this text is a summary of a legal case regarding costs the case started on february 25 2021 and is expected to conclude on october 24 2023 lasting a total of 2 years 7 months and 30 days the specific details about the parties involved and the nature of the costs are not provided the final resolution of the case involves the division of goods and the consideration of unpaid pension benefits there are two heirs involved one being the daughter of the deceased and the other being the son of the deceased the daughter is entitled to half of the goods while the son originally waived his share of the inheritance the case is based on the inheritance act specifically article 11 the court made a decision in favor of the heirs declaring their respective shares of the estate the text also explains the process of lodging an appeal in a legal case including the requirements and deadlines for filing an appeal
